metadata.title: CVE-2020-6077 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in themessage-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsingmDNS messages, the implementation does not properly keep track of theavailable data in the message, possibly leading to an out-of-bounds readthat would result in a denial of service. An attacker can send an mDNSmessage to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
